backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing per-user clients, tasks, and profiles with access control and CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, authentication gating, profile setup flow, and routes for dashboard, clients, and tasks.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated users to enter and save their name on first login.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignedOutSc: Public landing screen with sign‑in button and feature highlights for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientFo: Dialog component for creating, editing, and deleting clients with form validation and data encoding.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with navigation, user menu, and mobile sidebar handling.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskFormDi: Dialog component for creating, editing, and deleting tasks, including client selection and deadline handling.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskQuickS: Inline task status selector that updates a task’s status via mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/clients.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating client data through the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/tasks.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating task data, including per-client and individual queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and caches the backend actor, refetching dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hooks for retrieving and saving the current user’s profile via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, storing identity state, and exposing login status helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom color variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH values.
frontend/src/lib/dataParser.ts: Implements helpers to encode and decode Client and Task records, parsing contact info, status, tax years, priority, and deadlines.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed client info and related tasks, handling loading, error states, and editing via a dialog.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsPage.tsx: Shows a searchable, filterable list of clients with add-client dialog support and loading/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders dashboard metrics summarizing clients and tasks, with navigation shortcuts and full loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: React page that fetches, parses, filters, and sorts tasks with client data, URL-based filters, and a task creation dialog.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requirements, imagery, and current state for a task/client management app.
